FuncDef:
The vc bit-error-detection command enables VC(Virtual Circuit) bit error detection for virtual cluster access.
The undo vc bit-error-detection command disables VC bit error detection for virtual cluster access.
By default, VC bit error detection is not enabled for virtual cluster access.
ExtraInfo:
In virtual cluster access scenarios, when VPs are established to transmit services with high quality requirements, bit errors on VPs may cause service interruptions.
If the primary and backup VPs of a VP protection group are both in the excessive BER state or the backup VP fails, bit-error-triggered VP switching cannot protect traffic against bit errors, but bit-error-triggered VC switching can do so. To enable VC bit error detection, run the vc bit-error-detection command.
